post:
I have 2 months left on this HostUS OVZ Special Plan.

Specs: 

<code>1 vCPU Cores @ 2.2Ghz Fair Share
768MB DDR3 RAM
768MB SWAP
20 GB HW Raid-10 Disk Space
2048 GB Bandwidth
1 x IPv4 Addresses (With Automatic rDNS) </code>

Asking is $1.75, by PayPal. HostUS has since then increased the price of this plan to $15/yr, but this plan is $10/yr to renew. Just wanted to get rid of it, so I'll take any best offer too. Money will be donated to Doctors without Borders/MSF.

EDIT: I actually don't mind giving this away for free if you have an use for it too.
